message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's worth a lot to you, but I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $14,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $12,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,500?

I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $11,500. This is my final concession, so I hope we can meet at this price.
